name: WWF WrestleMania - The Arcade Game [SG]
description:
WWF WrestleMania: The Arcade Game is an arcade-fighting game developed by Midway Games and Sculptured Software. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Sculptured Software. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play WWF WrestleMania: The Arcade Game on SEGA Saturn, PlayStation, SEGA 32X and SNES.
